The Chief Imam of Ajegunle Central Mosque, Alhaji Idris Erusope has been arrested by the police in contico- tion with the alleged murder of a 20-year-old boy who reportedly died penultimate Saturday. Soldiers, Police Get Salary Increase Soldiers, Police Get Salary Increase
Remi Oyeyemi Remi Oyeyemi

Officers and men of the Nigerian Armed Forces and the Nigerian Police Force have received 100 per cent in- crease in salary and allowances apart from a special Christmas bonusap proved for them by the Head of State, General Sani Abacha. Officers and men of the Nigerian Armed Forces and the Nigerian Police Force have received 100 per cent in- crease in salary and allowances apart from a special Christmas bonusap proved for them by the Head of State, General Sani Abacha.

Also included in the new salary package are torchlight, uniform, medical, transport and housing allowances some of which had been stopped before now because of financial difficulties. PopeJohn Paul II has asked for God's blessing on Iraqi President Saddam Hussein and his people in a written message to Baghdad, the official news agency INA re- ported yesterday. PopeJohn Paul II has asked for God's blessing on Iraqi President Saddam Hussein and his people in a written message to Baghdad, the official news agency INA re- ported yesterday.

"May God bless you, you and your people, the pope said reply- ing to a message from Saddam congratulating the pontiff on the 16th anniversary of his rise to head of the Roman Catholic church.
